q: interviewing more than 100 witnesses, the New York-based Human Rights Watch concluded that postelection violence was overwhelmingly committed by Gbagbo supporters to intimidate people living in neighbourhoods that voted for the internationally recognized leader, Alassane Ouattara . As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated.
